title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 145 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 145 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.
lineList.cn: （大卫的赞美诗）我的神我的王阿，我要尊崇你。我要永永远远称颂你的名。

lineList.en: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.
lineList.cn: 我要天天称颂你，也要永永远远赞美你的名。

lineList.en: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.
lineList.cn: 耶和华本为大，该受大赞美。其大无法测度。

lineList.en: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.
lineList.cn: 这代要对那代颂赞你的作为，也要传扬你的大能。

lineList.en: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.
lineList.cn: 我要默念你威严的尊荣，和你奇妙的作为。

lineList.en: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.
lineList.cn: 人要传说你可畏之事的能力。我也要传扬你的大德。

lineList.en: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.
lineList.cn: 他们记念你的大恩，就要传出来，并要歌唱你的公义。

lineList.en: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.
lineList.cn: 耶和华有恩惠，有怜悯，不轻易发怒，大有慈爱。

lineList.en: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
lineList.cn: 耶和华善待万民，他的慈悲，覆庇他一切所造的。

lineList.en: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你一切所造，的都要称谢你。你的圣民也要称颂你，

lineList.en: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;
lineList.cn: 传说你国的荣耀，谈论你的大能，

lineList.en: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.
lineList.cn: 好叫世人知道你大能的作为，并你国度威严的荣耀。

lineList.en: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.
lineList.cn: 你的国是永远的国，你执掌的权柄，存到万代。

lineList.en: The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.
lineList.cn: 凡跌倒的，耶和华将他们扶持。凡被压下的，将他们扶起。

lineList.en: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.
lineList.cn: 万民都举目仰望你。你随时给他们食物。

lineList.en: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.
lineList.cn: 你张手，使有生气的都随愿饱足。

lineList.en: The LORD is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.
lineList.cn: 耶和华在他一切所行的，无不公义。在他一切所做的，都有慈爱。

lineList.en: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
lineList.cn: 凡求告耶和华的，就是诚心求告他的，耶和华便与他们相近。

lineList.en: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
lineList.cn: 敬畏他的，他必成就他们的心愿。也必听他们的呼求，拯救他们。

lineList.en: The LORD preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.
lineList.cn: 耶和华保护一切爱他的人，却要灭绝一切的恶人。

lineList.en: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
lineList.cn: 我的口要说出赞美耶和华的话。惟愿凡有血气的，都永永远远称颂他的圣名。
